p: Wukong gains stacking armor and max health regeneration while fighting champions and monsters.
q: Wukong's next attack gains attack range, deals bonus damage, and reduces the target's armor for a few seconds.
w: Wukong becomes Invisible and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies.
e: Wukong dashes to a targeted enemy and sends out images to attack enemies near his target, dealing damage to each enemy struck.
r: Wukong's extends his staff and spins it around repeatedly, gaining Movement Speed.  Enemies struck take damage and are knocked up.
